author: Gabrielle Drolet, Gabrielle Drolet
title: The sex workers working from home
description: Under coronavirus lockdown 'cam sex' is booming as sex workers sign up in droves to camming sites. Gabrielle Drolet speaks to the sex workers working from home, but explains that it's not easy work and the laws are not there to protect them
content:
While working as a stripper in Oregon, Kelpie Heart had long thought about taking her work online. Then the coronavirus pandemic led to bar closures, and she found herself out of work.
So, for the last month, Heart has begun streaming performances from home,… [+8287 chars]
